item.description:
Join us for a fun ladies night at California Closets Brighton showroom.

Guests will also enjoy a pink carpet fashion show featuring the latest fashions from Boston based designer Avni. Guests will also enjoy complimentary appetizers, cocktails and wine as they browse the beautiful California Closets showroom and check out the latest cosmetics from Mary Kay and some fabulous jewelry vendors all while a DJ entertains us. Be sure to wear your cute shoes for the famous pink carpet Best-in-Shoe walk-off competition and have a chance to win some fabulous prizes.

There is plenty of free parking at this event.


The event will also feature a raffle to win a $2,500 California Closets gift certificate! Proceeds will benefit Project Smile- the non profit organization helping children who are victims of traumatic events.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine inside the event area near the pink carpet. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Ladies Night: Cocktail Party- Free appetizers, cocktails & fashion show
